author: stsp
msg: Be kind and tolerate quotes around property values in auto-props
specifications. Some users expect that quoting these values works,
especially if the values contain whitespace. But Subversion used
to interpret the quotes literally, leading to unexpected property
values being set. Note that only the first pair of quotes is removed.
Nested quotes are retained.
See also r40200 which added to the default config file correct
examples for setting auto-prop values containing whitespace.
* subversion/libsvn_client/add.c
(unquote_string): New helper function.
(auto_props_enumerator): Use unquote_string helper to remove leading
and trailing single or double quotes from values of auto-props.
* subversion/tests/cmdline/autoprop_tests.py
(create_config, autoprops_test): Check that quoted auto-props values
are properly unquoted.

author: stsp
msg: * subversion/libsvn_subr/config_file.c
(svn_config_ensure): Provide an example for specifying an auto-prop
value for the svn:keywords property which contains several fields
separated by whitespace. Some users understandably quote the value,
but doing so is wrong.
E.g. *.txt = svn:keywords="Author Date"; will cause the property to
contain the literal string "Author Date" (with quotes).
I couldn't find documentation about this anywhere, so I'm putting an
example in the default config and hope people will see it.

author: stylesen
msg: Resolve some deprecation warnings.
* subversion/mod_dav_svn/repos.c
(get_resource): Use svn_uri_join(), svn_dirent_join() and some
formatting changes.

author: gstein
msg: This file was missing from r40108. Constify'ing some CHECKSUM outputs.
* subversion/tests/libsvn_wc/db-tests.c:
(test_getting_info, test_working_info): constify some CHECKSUM local
variables to match the read_info() output.

author: blair
msg: * subversion/libsvn_fs_fs/rep-cache-db.sql:
Spelling fix.
